result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Clerk Cheree
Cases 15CF749 and 15CM1681 called: 1:32pm
State appears by ADA C.Minder.  Def appears in person/in custody and with Atty Peter Prusinski.  
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW

State moves to:
15CM1681>>D&RI entire file
15CF749 - Ct. 2 (Carry Concealed Weapon)>>D&RI
15CF749 - Ct. 3 (Poss Para)>>D&RI
COURT GRANTS ABOVE

PLEA:
15CF749 - Ct. 1 (Armed Robbery w/Threat of Force/Attempt)>>GUILTY

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  

COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.
Defendant makes statement.

COURT ORDERS: Sentence W/held; 7 years probation.
CONDITIONS: 6 months MCJ w/huber for work/school/treatment if defendant qualifies under jail classification system (no credit); Any assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by PO; N/C with Downtown Pawn or with victim D.R.; Restitution of $13.50 to Downtown Pawn and $28.99 to Fleet Farm to be paid within one year from today; GFE to obtain/maintain FTE/FT schooling or a combination thereof, or any time he does not meet that requirement, defendant to perform 10 hours of community service per week; DNA sample and surcharge; CC.

COURT orders firearm forfeited that was seized in this case and signs order
>>If revoked, 116 days credit for time served.

Adj: 1:43pm

Final pre-trial at 02-08-2016 08:15 am.
Jury Trial at 02-23-2016 09:00 am.

No contact with victim(s): Fleet Farm in Wausau.  Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.
